QuestData.Title: Those Who Remember
QuestData.Description: The ghostly elves, to the south, once had the Pillar of Creation known as the Tidestone of Golganneth.$b$bTheir great city of Nar'thalas was destroyed an eon ago. The city's ruler, Prince Farondis, fell with the city. You small ones die so easily.$b$bIf anyone knows where the fragments rest, it will be the ghost of the prince. Seek out his people.
QuestData.LogDescription: Locate Nightwatcher Idri in the Drowned Gardens.
QuestData.RewardText: Who goes there?$b$bAre you an emissary from that bizarre floating city?
